todos.content: Analyze current interface against Nielsen's 10 heuristics
Apply Heuristic 1: Visibility of system status
Apply Heuristic 2: Match between system and real world
Apply Heuristic 3: User control and freedom
Apply Heuristic 4: Consistency and standards
Apply Heuristic 5: Error prevention
Apply Heuristic 6: Recognition rather than recall
Apply Heuristic 7: Flexibility and efficiency
Apply Heuristic 8: Aesthetic and minimalist design
Apply Heuristic 9: Help users recognize and recover from errors
Apply Heuristic 10: Help and documentation
Test and verify all improvements
